title: DeRay Mckesson on Dismantling the Legacy of Racism in America | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: DeRay Mckesson on Dismantling the Legacy of Racism in America | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: Speaking at BoF VOICES, the activist and author unpacks his 'five big ideas' on how to redefine and dismantle the realities of social injustice.To watch DeRay's talk at VOICES 2018 click here.  Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://
description:
Speaking at BoF VOICES, the activist and author unpacks his 'five big ideas' on how to redefine and dismantle the realities of social injustice.

To watch DeRay's talk at VOICES 2018 click here.  

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
